text: Diógenes Vergara (1970 - 9 February 2021) was a Panamanian politician. He was a Deputy for Partido Revolucionario Democrático from 2014 until 2019. He was born in Panama City, Panama. Vergara was shot and killed in Panama City on 9 February 2021, aged 50. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Panamanian politicians Category:Assassinated people Category:Murders by firearm
title: Diógenes Vergara
